specify regimes (Expansion: demand improving, EV profitability on track; Normalization: EV losses persistent but cash flow supported by dividend/credit; Downturn: demand and margins compress sharply) and note transition conditions (e.g., EV unit profitability breakeven margin, EV capex pacing, tariff regime changes) using 22PL3Q360 as the source for current EV losses, margins, and growth rates; This will elevate the piece from a narrative summary to a rigorously structured, scenario‑tested, first‑principles thesis aligned with the horizon and format constraints.
